biography.title: Biography
biography.p1: Born in Bursa in 1980. He graduated from Selçuk University State Conservatory, Department of Acting in 2005.
biography.p2: He started his career at Bursa State Theater and was deemed worthy of the Direklerarası Lions Kerem Yılmazer Young Talent Award for his performance in 'A Very Original Play'.
biography.p3: He continues his work as a director, actor, and producer in international projects based in Switzerland and the Netherlands. He signs global projects with his own production company, Time Right Production.

intro.sinema: This selection of film and television projects showcases Zafer Altun's dramatic depth and on-camera mastery. Each work represents a major milestone in his career.
intro.theater: Selected frames from theater stages reflect the artist's stage presence and character depth, offering special excerpts from contemporary and classical works.
intro.production: Training and production activities carried out under Time Right Production extend beyond Turkey to Europe. As an actor, director, and executive producer, he has undertaken major organizations, including a 30-day 'Pir Sultan Abdal' tour across 5 different countries, primarily in Switzerland (Zurich), Germany (Berlin), and the Netherlands. These global endeavors include international production roles, such as the 'Eny Finance' Commercial Series and the Simtronik Documentary Film, and acting workshops conducted under the Maya Kult Verein (Zurich).
